{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Intermec |model=WA21 |asin= |fcc_date=11/19/2003 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Actiontec |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=HN2WAMIG2,HN2WN-5MP01,OSZ38001M |ic_id=1223A-WAMIG2 |pwr_v=36-57 |pwr_amp=0.35 |pwr_conn= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=MPC8245;MPC8245LZU266D; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Actiontec 802MIG2 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880IK |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_module=Actiontec WN-5MP01 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi2_chip1_model=ISL3877 |wi2_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi2_chip2_model=ISL3687 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=a |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201BL |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=Fiber Optic Link |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:20:E0 |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|MobileLAN DualRadio Access Point}} :[http://www.currentdirections.com/pdfs/intermec/specs/WA21_spec_web.pdf PBrief]
CPU: [[Freescale]] MPC8245LZU266D @266MHz :See also [[Motorola]] and [[NXP]] chipmaker..
WLAN Module marked (installed in WA21/WA22): *ActionTec 802MIG2 (2.4GHz) FCC ID: HN2WAMIG2 *ActionTec WN-5MP01 (5GHz) FCC ID: HN2WN-5MP01 {{see also|Intersil ISL38001M|Intersil ISL37704M}}
